solution_line_template: There are {first_bucket_oranges} + {more_in_second_bucket} = <<{first_bucket_oranges}+{more_in_second_bucket}={second_bucket_oranges}>>{second_bucket_oranges} oranges in the second bucket.
There are {second_bucket_oranges} - {fewer_in_third_bucket} = <<{second_bucket_oranges}-{fewer_in_third_bucket}={third_bucket_oranges}>>{third_bucket_oranges} oranges in the third bucket.

There's a total of {first_bucket_oranges} + {second_bucket_oranges} + {third_bucket_oranges} = <<{first_bucket_oranges}+{second_bucket_oranges}+{third_bucket_oranges}={total_oranges}>>{total_oranges} oranges in the three buckets.
